wikipedia_page.main: Rigby Graham MBE  (2 February 1931 – 7 May 2015) was an English landscape and topographical artist who worked within the English Romanticism tradition.

response: * The Private Press Today, for the 17th King's Lynn Festival: an exhibition, arranged by Juliet Standing, designed to show the scope and quality of work produced during the last few years at various private presses [etc.], illustrations by Rigby Graham, The Riverside Room, July 22–29, 1967, published at The Orchard, Wymondham, Leicestershire by the Brewhouse Press (1967); ;
*Dr. Rigby Graham, Mural Painter and Illustrator. For services to the Arts.
* St Julian. With a drawing by Rigby Graham (Cog Press, 1973)
